issue.title: [Rust] Add support for take kernel functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-772, a take function would allow us random-access on arrays, which is useful for sorting and (potentially) filtering.
